attributes.action: Let Martha Payne (school meal blogger) carry the Olympic torch
attributes.additional_details:
As I write this 10-year old Martha Payne had raised £63,000 for Mary's meals through her blog about her school dinners. She has also started a political debate on school dinners in Scotland.

For both these reasons I think she should be recognised and invited to run with the Olympic torch as it makes its way to London. Here's a link to her story:-

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-scotland-glasgow-west-18472795

There's a short time to make this happen. Please vote!

rejection.details: This is a matter for the London Organising Committee of the Olympic and Paralympic Games (LOCOG).
